dialogue.introduction: Nagatsuki here. Don't make light of me as destroyers. I'm useful.
dialogue.library_intro: Eighth ship of the Mutsuki-class. After the occupation of Southeast Asia, I was assigned to escort duties. While unloading at Kolombangara, I had to fend off a surprise attack by the enemy fleet.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander, that's... well... Nagatsuki will be waiting here, alright?
dialogue.wedding: Relying on me so much is troubling... but it's not that simple. You're different, Commander.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Have you got the strategy hammered out? Then, off we go!
dialogue.equipment2: I'll have to work harder from here-on-in.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I don't really need a rest...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: If it's an order... I'll take a break.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new comrade? I'm looking forward to it.
dialogue.attack: Prepare for surface action to starboard!
dialogue.night_battle: I don't get this serious often! Let's keep going!
dialogue.night_attack: Feel the power of the Oxygen Torpedo!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Feel the power of the Oxygen Torpedo!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Feel the power of the Oxygen Torpedo!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Feel the power of the Oxygen Torpedo!
dialogue.mvp: No matter how many more comrades there are, none shall surpass me!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I got attacked... Not a direct hit, though...
dialogue.sunk: Sorry everyone... looks like this is as far as I'll go.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, it looks like today is a special day.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas, huh? What are you so merry about? Here, accept this. Well then, it's time for training.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, I'm happy that we were able to greet the new year together this year as well. I'll rely on you this year too.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun, huh. This event should be treated with care. ...Ow, Satsuki! Stop messing around!
